08.08.2013 AS SCR#18110 new password is stored in DB with new program GB339
+ passowrd is checked for compliance with ING password policy rules
03.06.2013 AS SCR#18107 fixed problem where wrong hash was calculated for salted password
07.05.2013 AS SCR#18107 apply salt value to passwords
06.05.2013 AS SCR#18110 password is case sensitive now
13.02.2012 AS SCR#15879 after password has chenged we relocate to #ICA101_03 - IBOL Login to build the screen for a logged in us

15.08.2009 AS there was a problem with lost session if
master user changed password for different user

30.09.2008 AK SCR14013 Test for GSET 58 (internal user)only for PL
25.03.2008 AK SCR13484 after reset password by MASTER user forced to change pass
After first Login, the client is now forced to change the given password

valid session ...
read general settings ....
check if program execution is allowed ....
continue with prog if access is not locked, otherwise print message and term
check if password change is allowed ....
if password encryption is enabled we need to compare encryted passwords
otherwise we compare unencrypted passwords
if there's not yet a salt value the password origins from a time before salt values were introduced
This also means that its from a time where passwords were not case sensitive so we do convert to uppercase herer
add salt value to password(s)
hash passwords ...
now check if password change can be allowed ....
change password if its allowed ....
MW SCR#7129 --> Disallowed for internal users
We set that to TRUE and then revoke this right if we find aqnything which is not
according to the requirements for a valid password change
check for compliance with ING passsword policy ...
current user is MASTER ....
MASTER user is allowed to change all passwords without knowing own (besides own)
MASTER user wants to change own password. Therefore he needs to know his own ...
Current user <> MASTER .....
user does not know old password (and is required to know) ....
check if new password has not been used before ....
password has been used before .....
In Poland this function is not allowed for internal users ...
username and password are not allowed to be identical
empty password is not allowed ...
demouser is not allowed to use this function ...
error#7: password not compliant with ING password policy rules
demouser is not allowed to use this function ...
Check if new password has been used before .....
compare new password with password#5 in password history
compare new password with password#4 in password history
compare new password with password#3 in password history
compare new password with password#2 in password history
compare new password with password#1 in password history
success actions .....
